entry.title: WIND WARNING , Nordegg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:35 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nordegg 1:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
Temperature: 6.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 41 %
Dewpoint: -6.4°C
Wind: WSW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 early this afternoon. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight with a few rain showers changing to a few flurries before morning. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 60 gusting to 90 late this evening then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
